Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $15000. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your business further. Kind regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
